entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -23.5°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Thursday 21 April 2016
